```{r valid_responses, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

valid_responses <- read_excel("G:/Shared drives/Projects/RAPID/RAPID-CC/Data Management/CC Clean Survey Data/Tracking Documents/Eligibility Tracking.xlsx", sheet = 2)

ggplot(valid_responses, aes(x=Week,y=ValidBL)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlab("Baseline Week") +
  ylab("Valid Baseline Responses")

ggplot(valid_responses, aes(x=Week,y=ValidFU)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlab("Follow-Up Week") +
  ylab("Valid Follow-Up Responses")
```
